name: BUHR I - Project Age Report
query:
SELECT 
`tabProject`.`customer` as "Customer:Link/Customer:300",
`tabProject`.`territory` as "Territory::80",
DATEDIFF(curdate(),`tabProject`.`creation`) as "Age::80",
count(*) AS "Positions::80",
sum(`tabTask`.`r1_count`) AS "Vacancies::80",
`tabProject`.`remark` as "Remarks::300",
`tabTask`.`project` AS "Project:Link/Project:200",
`tabProject`.`status` as "Status::120",
`tabProject`.`operation_status` as "Operation Status::120",
`tabTask`.`modified` as "Modified::120", 
`tabProject`.`cpc` as "Incharge::150"
FROM 
`tabTask`
Left Join `tabProject` ON `tabProject`.name =`tabTask`.project
WHERE
`tabProject`.cpc in ('poornima.k@voltechgroup.com','anil.p@voltechgroup.com','imthiyas.m@voltechgroup.com','senthu.k@voltechgroup.com','asha.a@voltechgroup.com','sathyabama.r@voltechgroup.com','kelwin.n@voltechgroup.com','sangeetha.a@voltechgroup.com','saraswathi.p@voltechgroup.com') and
`tabProject`.status in ('Open','Overdue','DnD')
AND
`tabProject`.territory in ('Singapore','India','Ghana','Qatar','Oman','Kuwait')
GROUP BY
`tabTask`.`project`
ORDER BY
`Age`,
`tabTask`.`project` ASC
